MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Llanrhaeadr, Prion and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located faulty electrical equipment on our overhead line network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 1.30AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32AM on 2nd December 2020.
